ygData.subject: Re: Encounter.
ygData.msgSnippet: Nighteyes looked at Squizzy just before she entered the CR chamber. Who is your leader, exactly? I dont even know what ship Im in. Aracnia entered the base,

    Nighteyes looked at Squizzy just before she entered the CR chamber. "Who 
is your leader, exactly? I dont even know what ship Im in."

    Aracnia entered the base, she didnt see Cyber Claw when she left, but she 
would send a transmission to her ass oon as she got to the bridge. She 
entered and saw her crew busy at work. Rampage, Tankkor, Tarantulas, 
Paralysis, Aerostreak, and of course he beloved Quickstrike.
    "Well Commander Quickstrike, things went as planned. Soon we will be 
united...and a council will be established on Earth for the Predacons."
    She walked around the room, and sent the message to Cyber Claw to come as 
quickly as possible for a briefing. Cyber Claw was an asset to the team, and 
he role would be Information Officer, as in getting and delivering top secret 
information. Mainly agianst the Maximlas, the Predacons sworn enemies.
